key.name: use-default-font
key.description: Whether to use the system's default fixed width font for editing text instead of a font specific to LaTeXila. If this option is turned off, then the font named in the "Editor Font" option will be used instead of the system font.

key.name: editor-font
key.description: A custom font that will be used for the editing area. This will only take effect if the "Use Default Font" option is turned off.

key.name: scheme
key.description: The ID of a GtkSourceView Style Scheme used to color the text.

key.name: create-backup-copy
key.description: Whether LaTeXila should create backup copies for the files it saves.

key.name: auto-save
key.description: Whether LaTeXila should automatically save modified files after a time interval. You can set the time interval with the "Autosave Interval" option.

key.name: auto-save-interval
key.description: Number of minutes after which LaTeXila will automatically save modified files. This will only take effect if the "Autosave" option is turned on.

key.name: reopen-files
key.description: Whether LaTeXila should reopen the files that was opened the last time.

key.name: tabs-size
key.description: Specifies the number of spaces that should be displayed instead of Tab characters.

key.name: insert-spaces
key.description: Whether LaTeXila should insert spaces instead of tabs.

key.name: forget-no-tabs
key.description: Forget you are not using tabulations.

key.name: display-line-numbers
key.description: Whether LaTeXila should display line numbers in the editing area.

key.name: highlight-current-line
key.description: Whether LaTeXila should highlight the current line.

key.name: bracket-matching
key.description: Whether LaTeXila should highlight matching brackets.

key.name: edit-toolbar-visible
key.description: Whether the edit toolbar (bold, italic, character sizes, ...) should be visible.

key.name: side-panel-visible
key.description: Whether the side panel at the left of editing windows should be visible.

key.name: bottom-panel-visible
key.description: Whether the bottom panel containing the build view should be visible.

key.name: side-panel-component
key.description: Side panel active component. 0: Symbols. 1: File browser.

key.name: interactive-completion
key.description: Automatically show commands proposals

key.name: interactive-completion-num
key.description: Minimum number of characters after '\' for interactive completion

key.name: document-view-program
key.description: Program for viewing documents (PDF, DVI, PS)

key.name: latexmk-always-show-all
key.description: Always show all information for the Latexmk post processor. If it is set to false, all the information will be displayed only if an error occurs during a command other than 'latex' or 'pdflatex'.

key.name: no-confirm-clean
key.description: No confirmation when cleaning-up

key.name: automatic-clean
key.description: Automatically clean-up files after close. no-confirm-clean must be true.

key.name: clean-extensions
key.description: The file extensions for the clean-up are separated by spaces

key.name: current-directory
key.description: URI of the file browser current directory

key.name: show-all-files
key.description: Show all files except hidden files

key.name: show-all-files-except
key.description: Show all files except those for clean-up (see preferences.latex.clean-extensions)

key.name: show-hidden-files
key.description: Show hidden files (beginnig with a dot). show-all-files must be true.

key.name: file-extensions
key.description: Show only files with one of these extensions. show-all-files must be false. The extensions (with the dot) must be separated with one space
